about.contactSubtitle: Any type of engagement is required so DO NOT hesitate to contact me. Even we can drink a cup of caffee together.
about.introduction: KAKIEE is a simple personal portfolio with technical blog section for sharing knowledge and codes. As an digital entrepreneur with experience, It is a pleasure to share what i've learned. Blogs can help other and show them how to do things in best practice. The name comes from "kaki fruit" which I love so much.

1.caption: Converting your design into a web page. Coding is our duty by using the most modern technologies.
1.title: IMPLEMENTATION

2.caption: Any projects needs a good planning before start coding and by using my experience, you can achieve your project to become reality.
2.title: PLANNING

3.caption: Optimization needs a deep understanding of how to do. Using my experience we can lead you into a faster and more reliable performance.
3.title: OPTIMIZATION

4.caption: With more than 5 years of experience, consulting and training is one of my services focusing on web technologies.
4.title: CONSULTING AND TRAINING

headerSection.title: Full-Stack developer is your way to go.

1.subtitle: Building a scalable back-end application to service multiple clients by using most modern technologies like Node.js and database like SQL / NoSQL with the best concepts like JWT / RESTfull API / GraphQL / Micro services.
1.title: Back-End

2.subtitle: Coding UX/UI is our responsibilities. Client experience comes first when developing interfaces and services. Clean, reusable and optimized code is our focus. By using the most modern framework like React.js / Angular.js / Vue.js.
2.title: Front-End

3.subtitle: We help you hosting your web site / web application and set up projects into a containers to serve as a service by using Linux / Nginx / Docker / Docker-compose. that will give you more flexibility for a feature modification and scalability.
3.title: Dev-Ops
